sentences.sentence: He performed the handspring-double salto forward very well, with high quality.
sentences.translation: 肖俊峰是我国跳马新秀，他完成的前手翻团身前空翻两周动作质量较高。

sentences.sentence: Straddle back handspring" is an important action in the beam voluntary of Ling Jie the world gymnastic champion."
sentences.translation: 分腿后手翻是体操世界冠军凌洁平衡木成套动作中的一个重要动作。
